usage.cn: 两颗相爱的心之间不需要言语。
usage.eng: No words are necessary between two loving hearts.

usage.cn: 爱情…在指缝间承诺 指缝….在爱情下交缠.
usage.eng: Love ,promised between the fingers.Finger rift,twisted in the love.

usage.cn: 尽管我们相隔千里，但在我们的心里面，爱是没有距离的。
usage.eng: No matter how many miles stood between us, love has no distance in our hearts.

usage.cn: 你应该做的是缩短当前状况与未来目标之间的差距。
usage.eng: Your problem is to bridge the gap which exists between where you are now and the goal you intend to reach.
